member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants
member.summary: LTI Advantage Library constants.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims
member.summary: LTI claims.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.Context
member.summary: Properties of the context from which the launch originated (for example, course id and title).

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.Custom
member.summary: This is a map of key/value custom parameters which are to be included with the launch.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.DeploymentId
member.summary: The deployment identifier, uniquely identifying the tool's deployment on the platform.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.LaunchPresentation
member.summary: Information to help the Tool present itself appropriately.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.Lis
member.summary: Properties about available Learning Information Services (LIS), usually originating from the Student Information System.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.MessageType
member.summary: The type of message.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.NamesRoleService
member.summary: The claim to include Names and Role Provisioning Service parameter in LTI 1.3 messages.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.Platform
member.summary: Properties associated with the platform initiating the launch.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.ResourceLink
member.summary: A link to tool's resource from the tool's platform.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.Roles
member.summary: An array of roles as defined in the Core LTI specification.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.RoleScopeMentor
member.summary: An array of the user_id values which the current user can access as a mentor.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiClaims.Version
member.summary: The minimum LTI version required.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.Lti
member.summary: LTI Advantage constants.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequestMessageType
member.summary: The message type of an LtiResourceLinkRequest.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.Lti.Version
member.summary: LTI version.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiScopes
member.summary: LTI Advantage API scopes.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiScopes.AssignmentGradesLineItem
member.summary: Assignment and Grade Service lineitem read/write scope.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiScopes.AssignmentGradesResultReadonly
member.summary: Assignment and Grade Service result readonly scope.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.LtiScopes.NamesRoleReadonly
member.summary: Names and Role Service readonly scope.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.MediaTypes
member.summary: Service media types.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.MediaTypes.MembershipContainer
member.summary: https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#membership-container-media-type

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims
member.summary: Subset of OpenID standard claims used by LTI Advantage. See https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#Claims.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims.Email
member.summary: End-User's preferred e-mail address. Its value MUST conform to the RFC 5322 [RFC5322] addr-spec syntax. The RP MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims.FamilyName
member.summary: Surname(s) or last name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple family names or no family name; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims.GivenName
member.summary: Given name(s) or first name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple given names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims.Locale
member.summary:
End-User's locale, represented as a BCP47 [RFC5646] language tag. This is typically an ISO 639-1 Alpha-2 [ISO639‑1] language code in lowercase and an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 [ISO3166‑1] country code in uppercase, separated by a dash. For example, en-US or fr-CA. As a compatibility note, some implementations have used an underscore as the separator rather than a dash, for example, en_US; Tools MAY choose to accept this locale syntax as well.
en-US

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims.MiddleName
member.summary:
Middle name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple middle names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters. Also note that in some cultures, middle names are not used.
"Marie"

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims.Name
member.summary:
End-User's full name in displayable form including all name parts, possibly including titles and suffixes, ordered according to the End-User's locale and preferences.
"Ms Jane Marie Doe"

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Constants.OidcClaims.Picture
member.summary:
URL of the End-User's profile picture. This URL MUST refer to an image file (for example, a PNG, JPEG, or GIF image file), rather than to a Web page containing an image. Note that this URL SHOULD specifically reference a profile photo of the End-User suitable for displaying when describing the End-User, rather than an arbitrary photo taken by the End-User.
"http://example.org/jane.jpg"

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextClaimValueType
member.summary: Properties of the context from which the launch originated (for example, course id and title).

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextClaimValueType.Id
member.summary: An opaque identifier that identifies the context where the launch originated. Must be unique within the scope of the tool_consumer_instance_guid.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextClaimValueType.Label
member.summary: A plain text label for the context.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextClaimValueType.Title
member.summary: A plain text title of the context.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextClaimValueType.Type
member.summary: An array of URI values that identify the type of context. The list MUST include a URN value drawn from the LIS vocabulary. The assumed namespace of these URNs is the LIS vocabulary so Tools can use the handles when the intent is to refer to an LIS context type. If the Platform wants to include a context type from another namespace, a fully qualified URN should be used.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextType
member.summary: Represents LIS Context Types

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextType.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown course type. Examine the claim directly.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextType.CourseTemplate
member.summary: A course template is the abstract course which is independent of when it is taught. The course template may have one or more course offerings, each of which may have one or more course sections.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextType.CourseOffering
member.summary: A course offering relates to the specific period of time when the course is available.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextType.CourseSection
member.summary: A course section is the specific instance into which students are enrolled and taught.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ContextType.Group
member.summary: A course group within a course section.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.CustomPropertySubstitutions
member.summary: Implements custom property substitutions as described in https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti/v1p3#custom-property-substitution.
member.remarks: You must supply substitution values for any substituion variables you support. Be careful not to provide personally identifiable information that is not available via the normal launch.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.CustomPropertySubstitutions.ReplaceCustomPropertyValues(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Replace custom property variables with custom property values.
member.param: Custom properties.
member.returns: Custom properties with the variables replaced.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.CustomPropertySubstitutions.SubstituteCustomVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Replace variable with value. Unknown variables are ignored.
member.param: Variable to replace.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.NamePrefix
member.summary:
This field contains the name prefix of the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.name.prefix. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.NameSuffix
member.summary:
This field contains the name suffix of the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.name.suffix. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.PhoneHome
member.summary:
This field contains the home phone number of the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.phone.home. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.PhoneMobile
member.summary:
This field contains the mobile phone number of the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.phone.mobile. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.PhonePrimary
member.summary:
This field contains the primary phone number of the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.phone.primary. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.PhoneWork
member.summary:
This field contains the work phone number of the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.phone.work. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.Sms
member.summary:
This field contains the SMS number for the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.sms. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.SourcedId
member.summary: $Person.sourcedId

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisPerson.WebAddress
member.summary:
This field contains the website address for the user account that is performing this launch.
Parameter: n/a. Custom parameter substitution: $Person.webaddress. Versions: 1.0, 1.1, 1.2.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.DocumentTarget
member.summary: Represents launch_presentation document_target values.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.DocumentTarget.Iframe
member.summary: The Tool is being launched within an iframe placed inside the same browser page/frame as the resource link.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.DocumentTarget.Window
member.summary: The Tool is being launched within a new browser window or tab.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LaunchPresentationClaimValueType
member.summary: Information to help the Tool present itself appropriately.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LaunchPresentationClaimValueType.DocumentTarget
member.summary: The type of 'browsing context' the launch occurred in. See https://www.w3.org/TR/html51/browsers.html#sec-browsing-contexts.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LaunchPresentationClaimValueType.Height
member.summary: The height in pixels of the window or frame where the content from the tool will be displayed.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LaunchPresentationClaimValueType.Locale
member.summary:
End-User's locale, represented as a BCP47 [RFC5646] language tag. This is typically an ISO 639-1 Alpha-2 [ISO639‑1] language code in lowercase and an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 [ISO3166‑1] country code in uppercase, separated by a dash. For example, en-US or fr-CA. As a compatibility note, some implementations have used an underscore as the separator rather than a dash, for example, en_US; Tools MAY choose to accept this locale syntax as well.
en-US

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LaunchPresentationClaimValueType.ReturnUrl
member.summary: Fully qualified URL within the tool platform interface to which the tool can redirect the user when it's done. An lti_log or lti_errormsg parameter may be added as a query parameter.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LaunchPresentationClaimValueType.Width
member.summary: The width in pixels of the window or frame where the content from the tool will be displayed.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LisClaimValueType
member.summary: Properties about available Learning Information Services (LIS), usually originating from the Student Information System.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest
member.summary: https://purl.imsglobal.org/spec/lti/v1p3/schema/json/LtiResourceLinkRequest.json

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Create an instance of with default values for the MessageType and Version claims.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Create an instance of with the claims.
member.param: A list of claims.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.#ctor(System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt.JwtPayload)
member.summary: Create an instance of with the claims in payload.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Audiences
member.summary: REQUIRED. Audience(s) for whom this ID Token is intended i.e. the Tool. It MUST contain the OAuth 2.0 client_id of the Tool as an audience value. It MAY also contain identifiers for other audiences. In the general case, the aud value is an array of case-sensitive strings. In the common special case when there is one audience, the aud value MAY be a single case-sensitive string.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.DeploymentId
member.summary: The required https://purl.imsglobal.org/spec/lti/claim/deployment_id claim's value contains a string that identifies the platform-tool integration governing the message.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.MessageType
member.summary: The type of LTI message. Must be "LtiResourceLinkRequest".

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.NamesRoleService
member.summary: The Names and Roles Provisioning Service claim.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Nonce
P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.ResourceLink
P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Roles
member.summary: An array of roles as defined in the Core LTI specification.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.UserId
member.summary: The required 'sub' claim's value contains a string acting as an opaque identifier for the user that initiated the launch. This value MUST be immutable and MUST be unique within the platform instance.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Version
member.summary: The version to which the message conforms. Must be "1.3.0".

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Context
member.summary: Properties of the context from which the launch originated (for example, course id and title).

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Custom
member.summary: This is a map of key/value custom parameters which are to be included with the launch.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.LaunchPresentation
member.summary: Information to help the Tool present itself appropriately.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Lis
member.summary: Properties about available Learning Information Services (LIS), usually originating from the Student Information System.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Platform
member.summary: Properties associated with the platform initiating the launch.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.RoleScopeMentor
member.summary: An array of the user_id ('sub' claim) values which the current user can access as a mentor.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Email
member.summary:
End-User's preferred e-mail address. Its value MUST conform to the RFC 5322 [RFC5322] addr-spec syntax. The Tool MUST NOT rely upon this value being unique.
"jane@example.org"

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.FamilyName
member.summary:
Surname(s) or last name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple family names or no family name; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.
"Doe"

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.GivenName
member.summary:
Given name(s) or first name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple given names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters.
"Jane"

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.MiddleName
member.summary:
Middle name(s) of the End-User. Note that in some cultures, people can have multiple middle names; all can be present, with the names being separated by space characters. Also note that in some cultures, middle names are not used.
"Marie"

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Name
member.summary:
End-User's full name in displayable form including all name parts, possibly including titles and suffixes, ordered according to the End-User's locale and preferences.
"Ms. Jane Marie Doe"

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.Picture
member.summary:
URL of the End-User's profile picture. This URL MUST refer to an image file (for example, a PNG, JPEG, or GIF image file), rather than to a Web page containing an image. Note that this URL SHOULD specifically reference a profile photo of the End-User suitable for displaying when describing the End-User, rather than an arbitrary photo taken by the End-User.
"http://example.org/jane.jpg"

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.LtiResourceLinkRequest.GenerateCryptographicNonce
member.summary: Generate a cryptographic nonce.
member.returns: A cryptographic nonce as a string value.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType
member.summary: Properties associated with the platform initiating the launch.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType.ContactEmail
member.summary: An email contact for the platform.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType.Description
member.summary: This is a plain text user friendly field which describes the platform.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType.Guid
member.summary: This is a unique identifier for the platform (not the software the platform uses). By common practice, this MAY be the domain of the institution hosting the platform or the subdomain of the platform instance within the institution's overall domain (especially if the institution has multiple platforms within its domain).

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType.Name
member.summary: This is a plain text user visible field to identify the platform.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType.ProductFamilyCode
member.summary: A code to identify the tool platform's software.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType.Url
member.summary: Common home HTTPS URL for the platform instance.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.PlatformClaimValueType.Version
member.summary: The version of the software the platform is currently running on.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ResourceLinkClaimValueType
member.summary: A link to tool's resource from the tool's platform.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ResourceLinkClaimValueType.Id
member.summary: This is an opaque unique within the tool platform identifier for that resource link. Uniqueness MUST be enforced within the platform.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ResourceLinkClaimValueType.Description
member.summary: A plain text description of the link’s destination, suitable for display alongside the link.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.ResourceLinkClaimValueType.Title
member.summary: A plain text title for the resource. This is the clickable text that appears in the link.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.Role
member.summary: The role of the user within a given context.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.BadRequestResponse
member.summary: A that when executed will produce a Bad Request (400) response.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.BadRequestResponse.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.BadRequestResponse.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new instance.
member.param: Contains the errors to be returned to the client.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesRequest
member.summary: Represents a GetMembership request.
member.remarks: Does not support membership differences. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#membership-differences.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Nullable{LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.Role})
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the class.
member.param: The context ID (e.g. course). Required.
Optional limit to the number of members to return.
Optional resource link filter for members with access to resource link.
Optional role filter for members that have the specified role.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesRequest.ContextId
member.summary: Required context ID of the membership context. For example, the course from which to get the membership.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesRequest.Limit
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of members to return.
member.remarks: This parameter is merely a hint. The server is not obligated to honor this limit and may at its own discretion choose a different value for the number of members to return. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#limit-query-parameter

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesRequest.Rlid
member.summary: filter for members to return.
member.remarks: The ID of a resource link within the context. The result set will be filtered so that it includes only members that are permitted to access the resource link. If omitted, the result set will include all members of the context with access to any resource. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#resource-link-id-query-parameter.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesRequest.Role
member.summary: filter for members to return.
member.remarks: The result set will be filtered so that it includes only those memberships that contain this role. The value of the parameter should be the full URI for the role, although the simple name may be used for context-level roles. If omitted, the result set will include all members with any role. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#role-query-parameter.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesResponse
member.summary: Represents a GetMembership response.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesResponse.#ctor
member.summary: Create an empty response

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesResponse.MembershipContainer
member.summary: Get or set the MembershipContainer.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: Get or set the HTTP status code representing the success or failure of the membership service request.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesResponse.StatusValue
member.summary: Get or set the HTTP status value representing the success or failure of the membership service request.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member
member.summary: Represents a member in the Membership container of the Membership service.
member.remarks: Member must not contain more information about the person than would be included in a basic launch. For example, if PII is not sent in basic launch from the same context, it should not be included in member. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#membership-container-media-type.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.ContextId
member.summary: The context ID. Repeated for each member. Corresponds to Id in .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.ContextLabel
member.summary: The context label. Repeated for each member. Corresponds to Label in .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.ContextTitle
member.summary: The context title. Repeated for each member. Corresponds to Title in .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.Email
member.summary: The primary email address for the person. Not specified if not included in a basic launch from same context. Corresponds to .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.FamilyName
member.summary: The person's assigned family name. Not specified if not included in a basic launch from same context. Corresponds to .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.GivenName
member.summary: The person's assigned first name. Not specified if not included in a basic launch from same context. Corresponds to .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.Message
member.summary: Contains context and resource link specific message parameters.
member.remarks: Included with when the membership list is filtered to users who can access a specific resource link. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#membership-container-media-type.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.Name
member.summary: The person's assigned full name (typically their first name followed by their family name separated with a space). Not specified if not included in a basic launch from same context. Corresponds to .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.Picture
member.summary: A URL to an image for the person. Not specified if not included in a basic launch from same context. Corresponds to .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.Roles
member.summary: The role/s this member has in the context. Does not include non-context roles. Corresponds to (without non-context roles).

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.LisPersonSourcedId
member.summary: A unique identifier for the person as provisioned by an external system such as an SIS. Corresponds to PersonSourcedId in .

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.Status
member.summary: Membership status is either Active or Inactive. Defaults to Active if not specified.
member.remarks: Use Deleted when reporting differences if membership no longer exists. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#membership-status.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.Member.UserId
member.summary: A unique identifier for the person. Corresponds to the "sub" claim.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MembershipContainer
member.summary: Represents the results returned by the Membership service. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0#membership-container-media-type.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MembershipContainer.Id
member.summary: The ID of these results. Typically the request URL to Membership service.

member.name: P:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MembershipContainer.Members
member.summary: The list of members in the specified context.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MembershipContainerResult
member.summary: wrapper for assigns the correct for the Content-Type header.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MembershipContainerResult.#ctor(System.Object,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MembershipContainerResult class.
member.param: The object to return.
The HTTP StatusCode to return.

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MemberStatus
member.summary: Names and Role Service member status values.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MemberStatus.Active
member.summary: Member is active

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MemberStatus.Deleted
member.summary: Member was deleted. Only used when the member is included in a difference response.

member.name: F:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.MemberStatus.Inactive
member.summary: Member is inactive

member.name: T:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.NamesRoleServiceControllerBase
member.summary: A that implements a REST API for the Membership service. See https://www.imsglobal.org/spec/lti-nrps/v2p0.
member.remarks: Unless it is overridden, the route for this controller will be "/context/{contextid}/[controller]" named "MembershipApi".

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.NamesRoleServiceControllerBase.OnGetMembershipAsync(LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.GetNamesRolesRequest)
member.summary: Populate the with the membership and set the StatusCode to signify success or failure.

member.name: M:LtiAdvantageLibrary.NamesRoleService.NamesRoleServiceControllerBase.GetAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Nullable{LtiAdvantageLibrary.Lti.Role})
member.summary: To get the membership for a particular context, the client submits an HTTP GET request to the resource's REST endpoint. The contextId must be embedded in the endpoint URL (e.g. /context/{contextId}/membership).
member.param: The context ID (e.g. course). Required.
Optional limit to the number of members to return.
Optional resource link filter for members with access to resource link.
Optional role filter for members that have the specified role.
member.returns: Returns if succesfull or an if a failure occurs.
